revised_title: John Samuel Forrest: A Pioneering Figure in Electrical Insulation and Transmission
tldr: John Samuel Forrest was a prominent figure in the development of electrical insulation and high-voltage transmission systems. He played a crucial role in the creation of the British Grid system and contributed to a better understanding of the mechanism of electrical breakdown, leading to improved designs of high-voltage insulators. Forrest's career included working at the Central Electricity Generating Board's Research Laboratory and serving as a visiting professor at the University of Strathclyde.
